law.catch_line: A certificate of need is required before an ambulatory care facility:...
law.text:
A certificate of need is required before an ambulatory care facility:
Offers any health service:
Through a health care facility;
In space leased from a health care facility; or
In space on land leased from a health care facility;
To provide those services, makes an expenditure, if a certificate of need would be required under § 19-120(k) of this subtitle for the expenditure by or on behalf of a health care facility; or
Does anything else for which the federal act requires a certificate of need and that the Commission has not exempted from that requirement.
